# Display

The display CSS property specifies the type of rendering box used for an element.


## `display-block`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |
| `$important` | `boolean` | (optional) Default: false |


## `display-inline-block`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |
| `$important` | `boolean` | (optional) Default: false |


## `display-inline`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |
| `$important` | `boolean` | (optional) Default: false |


## `display-none`

| Parameters | Type | Example |
| ---------- | ---- | ------- |
| `$important` | `boolean` | (optional) Default: false |
